dataset_info.name: FIFA Rating Prediction - Merged FIFA & FBref Statistics
dataset_info.description: Merged dataset combining EA Sports FIFA player ratings with real-world performance statistics from FBref (Football Reference). Contains 31,961 player-seasons from 10 major leagues spanning seasons 2017/18 to 2024/25.

columns.fifa_version: FIFA game version year (e.g., '19' for FIFA 19)
columns.short_name: Player's abbreviated name as shown in FIFA game (e.g., 'H. Son')
columns.long_name: Player's full name from FIFA database (accents normalized)
columns.player_positions: All playable positions for the player in FIFA (comma-separated)
columns.overall: FIFA overall rating (0-99). Primary target variable for prediction.
columns.potential: FIFA potential rating - maximum rating player can reach (0-99)
columns.value_eur: Player's market value in euros according to FIFA
columns.wage_eur: Player's weekly wage in euros according to FIFA
columns.age_fifa: Player's age in FIFA game version
columns.club_name: Player's club team name in FIFA
columns.league_name: League name. One of 10 major leagues included in dataset.
columns.club_jersey_number: Player's jersey number at their club
columns.body_type: Player's body type classification in FIFA
columns.pace: FIFA Pace attribute (0-99) - speed and acceleration
columns.shooting: FIFA Shooting attribute (0-99) - finishing and shot power
columns.passing: FIFA Passing attribute (0-99) - passing accuracy and vision
columns.dribbling: FIFA Dribbling attribute (0-99) - ball control and agility
columns.defending: FIFA Defending attribute (0-99) - tackling and defensive awareness
columns.physic: FIFA Physical attribute (0-99) - strength and stamina
columns.goalkeeping_diving: Goalkeeper diving ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.goalkeeping_handling: Goalkeeper handling ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.goalkeeping_kicking: Goalkeeper kicking ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.goalkeeping_positioning: Goalkeeper positioning ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.goalkeeping_reflexes: Goalkeeper reflexes ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.goalkeeping_speed: Goalkeeper speed/rushing ability (0-99). Non-goalkeepers have low values.
columns.born_fifa: Player's birth year from FIFA database (used for matching)
columns.player: Player's name from FBref database (matched to FIFA long_name)
columns.Playing Time_MP: Matches played - total appearances in the season
columns.Playing Time_Starts: Matches started - games where player was in starting XI
columns.Playing Time_Min: Total minutes played in the season
columns.team: Team name from FBref (matched to FIFA club_name)
columns.nation: Player's nationality code from FBref (3-letter ISO)
columns.pos: Primary position from FBref (FW/MF/DF/GK with variants). May be NaN for limited appearances.
columns.born_fbref: Player's birth year from FBref (used for matching with FIFA)
columns.Per 90 Minutes_PrgC: Progressive carries per 90 minutes - dribbles that move ball significantly toward goal
columns.Per 90 Minutes_PrgR: Progressive receptions per 90 minutes - passes received that move ball toward goal
columns.Per 90 Minutes_xG: Expected Goals (xG) per 90 minutes - quality of scoring chances
columns.Per 90 Minutes_xAG: Expected Assisted Goals (xAG) per 90 minutes - quality of chances created
columns.Per 90 Minutes_xG+xAG: xG + xAG per 90 minutes - total expected goal involvement
columns.Standard_SoT%: Shots on target percentage - (SoT / Total Shots) * 100
columns.Standard_Sh/90: Total shots (on + off target) per 90 minutes
columns.Standard_G/SoT: Goals per shot on target - finishing efficiency
columns.Standard_Dist: Average shot distance in yards from goal
columns.Expected_npxG/Sh: Non-penalty xG per shot - average shot quality
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Total_TotDist: Total passing distance in yards per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Total_PrgDist: Progressive passing distance per 90 minutes - distance toward opponent's goal
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Expected_xA: Expected Assists (xA) per 90 minutes - quality of passes leading to shots
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Expected_A-xAG: Assists minus xAG per 90 - over/underperformance on assists
columns.Per 90 Minutes_KP: Key passes per 90 minutes - passes that lead to shots
columns.Per 90 Minutes_1/3: Passes into final third per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_PPA: Passes into penalty area per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_CrsPA: Crosses into penalty area per 90 minutes
columns.SCA_SCA90: Shot-creating actions per 90 minutes - passes/dribbles/fouls leading to shots
columns.Per 90 Minutes_SCA Types_PassLive: Shot-creating actions from live-ball passes per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_SCA Types_PassDead: Shot-creating actions from dead-ball passes per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_SCA Types_Fld: Shot-creating actions from fouls drawn per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_SCA Types_Def: Shot-creating actions from defensive actions per 90
columns.GCA_GCA90: Goal-creating actions per 90 minutes - passes/dribbles/fouls leading directly to goals
columns.Per 90 Minutes_GCA Types_PassLive: Goal-creating actions from live-ball passes per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_GCA Types_PassDead: Goal-creating actions from dead-ball passes per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_GCA Types_Sh: Goal-creating actions from shots (assists on rebounds) per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_GCA Types_Fld: Goal-creating actions from fouls drawn (penalties won) per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_GCA Types_Def: Goal-creating actions from defensive actions per 90
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Tackles_Def 3rd: Tackles in defensive third per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Tackles_Mid 3rd: Tackles in middle third per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Tackles_Att 3rd: Tackles in attacking third per 90 minutes (pressing)
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Challenges_Lost: Dribbles challenged and lost per 90 minutes
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Tkl+Int: Tackles + Interceptions per 90 minutes - total defensive actions
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Err: Errors leading to opponent shot per 90 minutes
columns.Performance_GA90: Goals against per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_SoTA: Shots on target against per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_Saves: Saves made per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Performance_Save%: Save percentage (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_W: Wins per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_D: Draws per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_L: Losses per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Performance_CS: Clean sheets per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Performance_CS%: Clean sheet percentage (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Penalty Kicks_PKatt: Penalty kick attempts faced per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Penalty Kicks_PKA: Penalty kicks allowed per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Penalty Kicks_PKsv: Penalty kicks saved per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Per 90 Minutes_Penalty Kicks_PKm: Penalty kicks missed per 90 minutes (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.Penalty Kicks_Save%: Penalty kick save percentage (GK only). NaN for outfield players.
columns.name_parts: Internal field - set of normalized name tokens used for fuzzy matching algorithm. Can be dropped before modeling.

notes.missing_values: Many FBref statistical columns contain NaN values, particularly for players with limited playing time or goalkeepers (for outfield stats) and outfield players (for GK stats). Tree-based models (XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost) handle NaN natively and should not require imputation.
notes.per_90_normalization: Most FBref statistics are normalized per 90 minutes to enable fair comparison between players with different amounts of playing time.
notes.goalkeeper_stats: Goalkeeper-specific statistics (Performance_GA90, saves, clean sheets, penalties) are NaN for outfield players. Outfield stats are available for goalkeepers who played outfield.
notes.target_variable: The 'overall' column is the primary target for FIFA rating prediction models.
notes.duplicate_columns: 'fuzzy_name' column was dropped as it duplicates 'player' after merge. 'name_parts' is internal metadata and can be dropped.
notes.matching_methodology: Players matched between FIFA and FBref using fuzzy name matching with 6-strategy algorithm (intersection, subset, fuzzy names) combined with team matching and birth year verification. Backfill applied to recover players who matched in some seasons but not others.
notes.aggregation: FBref stats aggregated for players who transferred mid-season: Playing Time columns summed (cumulative), all other stats taken from primary club (rates/averages).
